context_bundle.summary: Istio: Service mesh for Kubernetes. Envoy sidecar proxies for traffic management. Key features: VirtualService/DestinationRule for routing, Gateway for ingress, mTLS, traffic splitting, fault injection, observability (Kiali, Jaeger integration), rate limiting.

onboarding.quick_start: Istio: 1) istioctl install --set profile=demo, 2) kubectl label namespace default istio-injection=enabled, 3) Deploy apps (sidecars auto-injected), 4) Create VirtualService for traffic rules, 5) Use Kiali dashboard for visualization.
common_patterns: VirtualService: route to different versions with weight (90/10 canary)
DestinationRule: define subsets, connection pool, outlier detection
Gateway: expose services externally with TLS termination

known_errors.error: upstream connect error or disconnect/reset before headers
known_errors.cause: mTLS mismatch - one side expects TLS, other doesn't
known_errors.solution: Check PeerAuthentication mode, ensure both pods have sidecars
known_errors.prevention: Use namespace-wide mTLS policy, enable sidecar injection consistently
